original_solution_mapping.L1: He runs at .1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=.1>>.1
original_solution_mapping.L2: While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x .1 = <<40*.1=4>>4
original_solution_mapping.L3: He has to run 2 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=2>>2
original_solution_mapping.L4: Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 1/15
original_solution_mapping.L5: He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because 2 / (1/15) = <<2/(1/15)=30>>30
original_solution_mapping.L6: It will take him 70 minutes in total because 40 + 30 =<<40+30=70>>70

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2421.
    Returns: the total time to jog 6 miles.
    """
    # L1
    speed_music_mph = 6 # runs at 6 MPH when he's got music on
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    speed_music_mpm = speed_music_mph / minutes_per_hour

    # L2
    album_length_minutes = 40 # His album is 40 minutes long
    distance_with_music = album_length_minutes * speed_music_mpm

    # L3
    total_distance_miles = 6 # jog 6 miles
    remaining_distance = total_distance_miles - distance_with_music

    # L4
    speed_no_music_mph = 4 # 4 MPH when he doesn't
    speed_no_music_mpm = Fraction(speed_no_music_mph, minutes_per_hour)

    # L5
    time_no_music = remaining_distance / speed_no_music_mpm

    # L6
    total_time_minutes = album_length_minutes + time_no_music

    # FA
    answer = total_time_minutes
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He runs at {speed_music_mpm} miles per minute because {speed_music_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{speed_music_mph}/{minutes_per_hour}={speed_music_mpm}>>{speed_music_mpm}

While the album is playing he can run {distance_with_music} miles because {album_length_minutes} x {speed_music_mpm} = <<{album_length_minutes}*{speed_music_mpm}={distance_with_music}>>{distance_with_music}

He has to run {remaining_distance} miles without the album because {total_distance_miles} - {distance_with_music} = <<{total_distance_miles}-{distance_with_music}={remaining_distance}>>{remaining_distance}
Without music he runs {speed_no_music_mpm} miles per minute because {speed_no_music_mph} / {minutes_per_hour} = {speed_no_music_mpm}

He will run the remaining {remaining_distance} miles in {time_no_music} minutes because {remaining_distance} / ({speed_no_music_mpm}) = <<{remaining_distance}/({speed_no_music_mpm})={time_no_music}>>{time_no_music}
It will take him {total_time_minutes} minutes in total because {album_length_minutes} + {time_no_music} =<<{album_length_minutes}+{time_no_music}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because 2 / (4/60) = <<2/(4/60)=30>>30
